query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fieldWorkerActivityLogs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  logId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  fieldId INT,
  taskId VARCHAR(50),
  activityType ENUM('crop_health', 'pest_monitoring', 'disease_detection', 'irrigation', 'fertilizer_application', 'weed_control', 'harvest', 'equipment_check', 'soil_test', 'weather_observation', 'general_note') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  observations TEXT,
  gpsLatitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  gpsLongitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  photoUrls TEXT,
  duration INT,
  status ENUM('draft', 'submitted', 'reviewed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  reviewedBy INT,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP,
  reviewNotes TEXT,
  syncedToServer BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kNF22PapS9mysw.root --database WZQk4bD8DnsRHwYBkmh7FN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fieldWorkerActivityLogs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  logId VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  farmId INT NOT NULL,
  fieldId INT,
  taskId VARCHAR(50),
  activityType ENUM('crop_health', 'pest_monitoring', 'disease_detection', 'irrigation', 'fertilizer_application', 'weed_control', 'harvest', 'equipment_check', 'soil_test', 'weather_observation', 'general_note') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  observations TEXT,
  gpsLatitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
  gpsLongitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
  photoUrls TEXT,
  duration INT,
  status ENUM('draft', 'submitted', 'reviewed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  reviewedBy INT,
  reviewedAt TIMESTAMP,
  reviewNotes TEXT,
  syncedToServer BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
